title: No Document Import in Page
content:
# No Document Import in Page

> Prevent importing `next/document` outside of `pages/_document.js`.

title: No Document Import in Page
content:
## [Why This Error Occurred](#why-this-error-occurred)

`next/document` was imported in a page outside of `pages/_document.js` (or `pages/_document.tsx` if you are using TypeScript). This can cause unexpected issues in your application.
preview: `next/document` was imported in a page outside of `pages/_document.js` (or `pages/_document.tsx` if you are using TypeScript). This can cause unexpected issues in your application.

title: No Document Import in Page
preview: Only import and use `next/document` within `pages/_document.js` (or `pages/_document.tsx`) to override the default `Document` component: pages/\_document.js [Code Block]

title: No Document Import in Page
